entry.title: 4000 Essential English Words
entry.summary: This deck is a enhanced version of the 4000 Essential English Words (all books) deck, now integrated with AI features powered by Langki.
entry.content:
This deck is an enhanced version of the 4000 Essential English Words (all books) deck, now integrated with AI features powered by Langki.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

It is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.

entry.title: Multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice
entry.summary: This template helps create multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice.
entry.content:
This template helps create multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice. All options are generated by AI and are randomized with each review.

It is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

Modify the template if you want to change the definition in the flashcard

Important: AI is only triggered to generate the flashcard when both the Front and Back fields are empty.

entry.title: Prototype Template
entry.summary: This prototype template enables Anki users to integrate an AI chatbot into flashcards and extend the core functionality of Anki.
entry.content:
This template is a prototype for Langki templates allowing Anki users to integrate AI chatbot into flashcards and extends the core features of Anki.

By default, it's configured for English learners, but you can clone or customize it to suit your needs.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

The template is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.
